flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 7/10 = <<40*7/10=400/7>>400/7 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=50>>50 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 50 x 3/5 = <<50*3/5=30>>30 games.
So, it still needs to win 30 - 400/7 = <<30-400/7=-190/7>>-190/7 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - -190/7 = <<10--190/7=260/7>>260/7 games.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 400/7. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
